author: ndw
msg: Fix bug with file: URLs getting too many slashes (file:////) which caused confusion
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'JDK1_4_IBMv2'.

author: neilg
msg: Enable applications who do not wish to set the context classLoader (that of the current thread) to still find a parser/transformer implementation.  If the class loader of the current thread is null or produces a ClassNotFoundException, this allows the "current" classloader (the one that loaded the factory) to be used as a fallback.  Keeps this code in sync with Xerces
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'jdk-ri-1_4_0'.
